title: Silver+ Team LF Support/Mid/Jungle
body:
New team forming looking for the following roles:
Support
Mid
Jungle

Please reply to this post with your
Role
Rank
Favorite Champs
Times Available 

or you can add me in game... IGN: DJ ANDY D

replies.body:

Rank: Gold 5

Favorite Champs: {{champion:89}} {{champion:201}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:25}} 

Times Available: usually after 8:00 P.M. MT i am all good to play, can try to adjust schedule if needed

Please reply to this post with your

Rank: S3(S2 frequent).  I cant get passed the damned promos to S1 lol
Favorite Champs: all assassins except for ahri/Leblanc, thresh, morg, elise, eve, maokai, 
Times Available: 8:30-11pm est, 1245-6am est,  Weekends im free for whatever USUALLY.

I'm interested.

Btw, nice Coast icon.
